value:
$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Brothe— Excuse me, King Fáfnir.
Your Majesty.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Out with it, Ótr.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|The troops we sent to Askr were
defeated at the border, sire...and our
sister Reginn got herself captured.$k$pAnd now the Askran army is
advancing on Niðavellir, with
Reginn in tow.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Hm. Too much for her to handle
after all, was it? Fine. Leave her.
It's better this way.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|But, sire, if we do nothing to stop
them, Reginn will...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Explain to me why I should care
for someone so clearly worthless.
Sisters be damned.$k$p$EFace_Smile|If the Askrans dispose of her,
that's one less piece of trash
I need to deal with myself.$k$pPerhaps I should thank them for
saving me the time and effort, hm?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|As you wish...Your Majesty.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Whatever else comes of it is your
responsibility. It was your idea to
invade Askr in the firs—$k$p$EFace_Pain|Hng! Grgh...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Brother! Are you all right?
Is your head still—$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It's nothing! As I was saying...the
mess is yours to clean up. I haven't
the time for such trifles.$k$pWhere to next... Where to next...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Trifle? The capture of our sister
is so unworthy of your time? What
has happened to you, Brother...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|So, you have brothers, Princess
Reginn? Two, right?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|That's right! The oldest is Fáfnir,
who is king of Niðavellir...$k$pThen our middle sibling
is named Ótr.$k$pThough, only Ótr and I are
related by blood.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|How do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, Ótr and I are orphans! I don't
remember everything because I was
just a baby, but...$k$p$EFace_Pain|When the old king was killed, a long
time ago, the kingdom fell into chaos.
That was when our parents died...$k$pBut Ótr kept me close, and we
wandered here and there, just
trying to survive.$k$pWe were staying in a village when
violence broke out. Fáfnir saved us,
and he let us stay with him after.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|I see now why you mentioned
you're not blood related!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|None of that matters, though,
really. What matters is the time
we spent together.$k$pThey're both strong and brilliant.
I'm proud to have them as brothers!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Sounds like you have every right!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|King Fáfnir took in orphans and
raised them as family... That is
no small act of kindness.$k$pGiven his recent inhumane
aggression, I almost can't
believe it really happened.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|Commander...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah. My apologies.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No, no. It's true, what you said.
And his ire is not limited to those
outside our borders.$k$pSince Niðavellir is always at war,
families are separated to add bodies
to the war effort, and food is scarce.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Everyone has been suffering for
a long, long time. So that's why—$k$p$Sbs1000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The enemy! They're upon us!$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03_2,0|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Those were Ótr's troops! Could he
have found me already? I thought
this route would hide us better...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The seiðjárn arts of Niðavellir
are more powerful than expected.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We were always going to be found
out sooner or later, but we'll need to
avoid senseless combat to succeed.$k$pPrincess Reginn, how long until
we reach our destination, the goal
you spoke of before?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Hm... Less than three days. We have
to get to the forest sanctum, where
the forest sage Eitri lives.$k$pEitri will definitely know how we
can stop Fáfnir!$k$p$EFace_Anger|But if Ótr knows we're here, we'll
have to make every second count!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Right. Continuing to confront
Niðavellir's army will not end
well for us.$k$pLet's move, quick and quiet as
we can. We'll just have to do
our best to conserve strength.$k$p$Sbs150|
